page.title: 02A Day in My Life
page.content: I am an 11 year 0ld boy and I live in the country with my parents and brothers and sisters.At 7:15 every morning I get up and prepare for school.I usually wear grey trousers,a blue T-shirt and a grey pullover.After breakfast my brother and I cycle to the bus stop which is about a mile away from the house.The bus picks us up at 8:30am and takes us to Kirton Primary School with several other children.When we arrive there we play in the playground until the bell rings and lessons begin.We start with Assembly and then have mathematics, English,science,history or geography and sometimes P.E. or games.We do quite a lot of art and craftwork after eating our packed lunch.Ay 3:15 the bus takes us home again,and we cycle to our house.After tea I play with my friends or watch T.V. until 9:30.
